explanation: Positive experience with good food, friendly service, and quality drinks; also noted as great for happy hour and day-drinking.
Extremely high praise for the crawfish etouffee, considered the best outside of Louisiana.
Regulars enjoy the good, filling food, but note it's typical for a strip mall pizza place.
Extremely negative experience due to perceived dishonesty and attempt to overcharge for a simple fix.
Enthusiastically positive, highlighting amazing food and multiple visits, recommending it highly.
Overall positive experience with good location, price, parking, and clean rooms, despite minor noise issues.
Very positive for top seafood, good happy hour, and late-night food, though service can be inconsistent.
Enthusiastic praise for both ramen and boba tea, calling it "awesome."
Highly positive, describing it as a great favorite place with awesome food and generous portions.
Very negative experience due to consistently poor food quality and tiny portions, leading to a decision not to return.
Positive experience with good food, efficient service for a large group, and reasonable pricing.
Extremely positive, highlighting great atmosphere, accommodating staff, excellent prices, and a fun experience.
Short but strong praise, using an iconic reference to convey excellence.
Positive overall for competitive prices, wide selection, convenient hours, and specific unique items, despite minor issues with deli staff and parking.
Extremely positive experience, highlighting exceptional help and excellent service, leading to strong gratitude and recommendation.
Mixed to negative, with the burger being just "okay" and other items like fries and beverages being overpriced and unimpressive.
Mixed to negative; while acknowledging quality, the store is too high-end for the reviewer and a specific negative experience with service leads to disappointment.
Informative and implicitly positive, highlighting a useful and good option for calorie-conscious diners.
Enthusiastic praise for great pizza and an awesome appetizer.
Positive review, highlighting the airport's convenience and efficiency for specific travel needs.
Very positive for the fantastic burger and improved fries, with only minor suggestions for improvements in drinkware.
Enthusiastic praise for great Cajun food, consistent quality, friendly staff, fantastic value, and being a "gem" for seafood.
Highly negative experience due to rude staff, overpriced services, uncomfortable heat, and malfunctioning equipment.
Positive experience with extremely helpful staff, good amenities, and fantastic pool, despite minor issues with room noise and banquet food taste.
Enthusiastically positive, praising the fresh, hot, delicious food, friendly service, and overall great experience, planning to return.
Positive experience, satisfied with perfectly cooked food, refreshing drink, and good value for a filling meal.
Strongly negative due to consistently high prices.
Very positive experience with exceeded expectations, good happy hour, excellent value on meals, and fast, friendly service.
Mixed to negative, with consistently out-of-service equipment, strange staff, and higher prices, balanced only by short wait times.
Severely negative experience due to extremely poor and slow service, which overshadowed the "fine" food, leading to a decision not to return.
Extremely negative experience due to bland, dry, and poor-quality food, leading to strong disappointment and a decision to never return.
Extremely negative, detailing a highly frustrating and confusing experience with non-standard gas pumps and a decision to never return.
Mixed, with highly rated pulled pork and an intent to return, but negatives regarding location and an unimpressive side dish.
Highly enthusiastic and positive, describing it as a "cutest place ever" with great breakfast and coffee, full of quirky charm.
Extremely positive, highlighting exceptional cleanliness, efficiency, fresh food, and friendly staff, making it a standout Subway location.
Highly positive, praising the shop's family-like, friendly, and unintimidating atmosphere with skilled tattooers, recommending it strongly.
Extremely positive, declaring them the "best sandwiches ever tasted" with perfect ingredients and bread.
Mixed to positive, with high praise for the chicken and waffles and an intent to return, but disappointment with portion sizes for the price and one dish.
Positive, highlighting great BBQ (brisket and ribs), delicious root beer, and good sides, despite a dislike for cafeteria-style ordering and one side.
Extremely negative, expressing strong regret over money spent and a firm decision never to return.
Highly negative, criticizing all aspects of the food as mediocre and overpriced, with specific dishes being poor, leading to significant disappointment.
Extremely negative, with food described as "absolutely horrible" due to poor quality and preparation, compounded by a cramped dining environment.
Extremely negative, describing a creepy atmosphere, poor drink quality, and unappealing decor, with strong disdain for the clientele.
Extremely negative, detailing a frustrating and dangerous experience of getting lost on poorly marked trails, leading to strong resentment.
Enthusiastically positive, praising great food, wonderful service, and a welcoming, chic atmosphere, recommending it despite being pricey.
Extremely positive, highlighting friendly staff, delicious food, bargain prices, and being the "best bargain" for spice lovers.
Positive, praising the nice, well-organized store with helpful staff, good selection, and reasonable prices with coupons, indicating a desire to return.
Extremely positive, giving high praise to the "absolute best crab salad" and very good iced teas in a well-appointed setting, strongly recommending it.
Extremely positive experience, praising delicious and generously portioned sushi, fair pricing, and a strong intent to return.
Extremely negative, detailing a taxi service that was late, got lost, and caused the reviewer to miss a non-refundable class, leading to financial loss and calling it the "worst ever."
Extremely negative due to a significant decline in food quality, with wrong ingredients, greasy dishes, and an overall "truly awful" experience, opting for a fast-food chain instead.
Mixed to positive, noting it's "okay" and not the best, but definitively preferred over Denny's for breakfast.
Extremely positive, highlighting the unique and amazing animal-filled atmosphere that makes dining a thrilling experience, despite the food being only "fairly decent."
Positive experience, praising delicious food, decent prices, friendly staff, and good problem resolution, despite the place being a "bit shabby."
Positive, with good beer and excellent service, unique beer education, and generally decent food, rating it explicitly as a 4.
Mixed, with positive aspects like the layout and view, but significant negatives concerning drink prices and limited options, needing changes to encourage return visits.
Extremely positive, praising the delicious food (especially salmon and bread pudding), great atmosphere, good service, and strong intent to return.
Extremely positive, expressing love for the super delicious and inexpensive fro yo, with a strong desire to return.
Extremely positive, highlighting consistent satisfaction with the food, excellent service, and friendly staff.
Highly negative, describing a significant decline in value (higher price, smaller portion), poor service, and overall disappointment.
Extremely negative due to misleading opening hours and the store being closed during advertised hours, leading to wasted time and failed attempts at service.
Extremely negative, criticizing food as under-seasoned and using store-bought tortillas, leading to a decision not to return.
Positive, praising the fun atmosphere for groups, good bar staff, and amenities, despite "a little beat" facilities and decent but not exceptional food.
Mixed to negative, as it's a standard Target but negatively impacted by atrocious traffic and parking in its location.
Positive for delicious food and great value, but the dining room is described as "disgusting," preventing a higher rating.
Mixed to negative, with food (pizza, salads, gelato) falling short of expectations despite a cool concept, being only slightly better than a fast-food chain.
Extremely positive, describing an excellent dinner with wonderful food (halibut, prime rib, scalloped potatoes), declaring it the "best ever" and a must-return.
Extremely positive, calling it a "favorite Pho" with great food and friendly staff, and an intent to return.
Strongly negative, unimpressed by the food, specifically criticizing store-bought dressing and mushy tomatoes.
Extremely positive, highlighting a great time with cool atmosphere, tasty and well-priced food, awesome and attentive service, and a strong intent to return.
Mixed, with a delicious veggie sandwich being the sole positive, but significant drawbacks due to slow service and understaffing.
Extremely negative, lamenting a significant decline in food and overall experience since franchising, calling it a "big fat Greek disappointment."
Extremely positive, praising the unique concept, good, tasty, and satisfying food, generous portions, and excellent customer service, with only a minor drawback of a small interior.
Extremely positive, highlighting the great atmosphere, cool bartender, cheap prices, awesome jukebox, and overall love for the place.
Mixed to negative, with a positive atmosphere but significant disappointment in the value and portioning of the food, leading to a decision not to return for dining.
Extremely positive, describing a terrific experience with an easy donation process and praising the great staff and community benefit.
Strongly negative due to repeated double billing issues and the necessity to dispute charges, leading to an avoidance of debit card use.
Extremely positive, expressing strong love for the cafe, its amazing food, and cute, artsy atmosphere.
Positive experience overall, praising the nice atmosphere, unique salsa bar, and several excellent dishes, despite disappointment with one specific taco.
Extremely positive, highlighting amazing salads and bread pudding, excellent service, and a great selection of beverages.
Extremely positive, praising delicious pizza, wonderful atmosphere, and divine Nutella crepes.
Positive, praising generous portions, friendly staff, nice atmosphere, and good sandwiches.
Mixed to positive, with several "amazing" standout dishes, but some bland/basic items and notably slow service, though the reviewer intends to return.
Positive, enjoying the conducive work environment, decor, music, good coffee, and friendly staff, declaring themselves a fan.
Positive, praising the classic, cool, and classy atmosphere as the primary draw, despite the food being only "pretty good."
Positive, highlighting a great dog park with ample space and amenities, despite minor issues with some dog owners.
Extremely positive, declaring it the "best barber shop ever" due to top-notch attention to detail.
Positive, praising decent car wash, fair pricing, competitive gas, and a senior discount.
Highly positive, praising homemade fresh noodles and comparing them favorably to San Francisco Chinatown food.
Positive, finding a specific item at a good price that a competitor lacked, recommending it as a worthwhile alternative.
Extremely positive, describing it as a great wine bar with very good food and a cozy atmosphere.
Mixed to negative, with average food (decent omelet, bad potatoes) and slow service, leading to a recommendation to skip the place despite an appealing patio.
Negative, suggesting the place is overpriced or overhyped for its quality by comparing it to a basic fast-casual chain.
Extremely positive, highlighting a great dining experience with welcoming decor, friendly staff, delicious food, good portions, and an overall excellent experience leading to a definite return.
Positive, enjoying the charming atmosphere, good coffee, and especially the very nice staff that encourages repeat visits.
Extremely positive, expressing strong impression and calling the food amazing, huge, delicious, authentic, and a fantastic value, highly recommending it.
Positive, highlighting the hotel as a hidden jewel with great rooms, complimentary breakfast, and good family amenities, but docking a star for a small, unimpressive pool.
Positive, praising the consistent cleanliness, good stock, and efficient checkout times, making it a reliable neighborhood grocery store.
Mixed to positive, with fantastic dishes and a great atmosphere/view, but a notable negative experience with a specific dish that was resolved by staff.
Mixed to negative, with excellent taste and selection heavily outweighed by extremely high prices for portions, leading to a strong recommendation against buying.
